name: Laser Piano Free
description:
Try a completely new, original, fun, exciting and relaxing music and game experience with the sounds of your Laser Piano synth! Compose your songs or play the music game: are you ready for this great music experience?

Some features:
* Play Music or Play Game modes.
* High quality piano synth sounds (3 different sets available).
* 5 different laser sets and 9 beautiful backgrounds to use.
* Background music loops to accompany your compositions.
* Classic and Level game modes. Two difficulty levels to ensure longevity.
* Music AI to create virtually infinite music compositions for game mode. Each match is new and different!
* Expressly and exclusively designed for the iPhone, with a beautiful, immediate and intuitive user interface.
* Beautiful graphic, with Retina display on iPhone 4.
* Playable for everybody and anybody! Really fun for all ages! Play and dance to the sounds of your laser piano synth!
* iOS 4 multitasking support.
* Compatible with both iOS 5 and iOS 4.
* Do you have additional features/improvements to suggest for the next update? Just contact us!


*** And have fun making your music compositions! ***

Download also our other Music Applications on App Store, some are FREE!


Thanks for using our products. Feedback is always welcome to: support@dighentis.com
App Store reviews are greatly appreciated, thank you.
